inclusion.criterion: complain of localized provoked vulvar pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: meet the criteria for the diagnosis of localized provoked vulvodynia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: have failed or have been unable to tolerate previous attempts at systematic therapy or surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: dermatologic or neurologic condition which is determined by the investigator to be the primary cause of the patient's pain
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to any of the medications or the base itself
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has failed previous attempts at systematic therapy.
